entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High 9. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
